alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:33PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Suffolk County through 215 PM EDT... At 132 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Fairfield, or 9 miles northwest of Port Jefferson, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Manorville, Middle Island, Port Jefferson, Wading River, Center Moriches, Coram, Mastic, Rocky Point, Mount Sinai, Calverton, Yaphank, Brookhaven National Laboratory, Setauket, Ridge and Miller Place. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk
